hero.subtitle: This is a 90‑day trial membership supported by voluntary contributions. What you get is a training environment: cadence, deliverables, reviews, and community accountability—built around Mind, Market understanding, and Price Action. What you do not get is any performance promise. Rebuild perception and execution first; outcomes are a byproduct, not a guarantee.

rules.title: Rules & Notes
items: Global donations are accepted for a 90-day trial membership. Starting at $999 (USDT/USDC only).
Donations are private contributions with no promises and no binding commercial obligations.
Members may join community training and a 21-day coaching sprint.
High performers may opt into a challenge. If passed: (1) lifetime advanced training, (2) $10k–$200k MOM allocation access, (3) top matrix club.
For Mainland China members, digital RMB is supported. Contact the team lead for details.
